name: test_name
story_text: test_story_text
effect: test_effect

name: Melee Weapon Free Strike
story_text: A basic melee attack that every hero can perform.

name: Ranged Weapon Free Strike
story_text: A basic ranged attack that every hero can perform.

name: Friend Catapult
story_text: As a maneuver, you grab a willing adjacent ally or object of your size or smaller, then vertical push that target up to a number of squares equal to twice your Might score.
targets: One willing adjacent ally or object of your size or smaller
effect: Vertical push target up to twice your Might score in squares. Reduce fall damage by twice your Might score. Can't use again until earning 1+ Victories.

name: Arcane Trick
story_text: You can perform various minor magical effects.
effect:
Choose one of the following effects:
• You teleport a size 1S or smaller object adjacent to you into an unoccupied space adjacent to you.
• Until the start of your next turn, a part of your body shoots a shower of harmless noisy sparks that light up each square adjacent to you.
• You ignite or snuff out (your choice) every mundane light source of 1L or smaller adjacent to you.
• You transform up to 1 pound of edible food you touch to make it taste delicious or disgusting.
• Until the start of your next turn, you make your body exude a particular odor you've smelled before. This smell can be sensed by each creature within 5 squares of you, but can't impose any condition or other drawback on those creatures.
• You place a small magical inscription on the surface of a mundane object you touch, or you can remove an inscription that was made by you or by another creature using Arcane Trick.
• You touch a size 1T object to cover it with an illusion that makes it look like a different object. Any creature who handles the object becomes aware of the illusion. The illusion ends when you stop touching the object.

name: Creature Sense
story_text: You can sense the nature of nearby creatures.
effect: If that creature is your level or lower, you learn the keywords in their stat block (Demon, Humanoid, Undead, and so forth).

name: Invisible Force
story_text: You can manipulate objects with your mind.
effect: You can grab or manipulate the target object with your mind, moving the object up to a number of squares equal to your Reason, Intuition, or Presence score (your choice). You can use this ability to turn doorknobs, pull levers, and so forth. You can manipulate any small movable piece of a larger object as long as the piece is unattended and size 1T. You can't use this ability to break a smaller piece off a larger object.

name: Psychic Whisper
story_text: You can send telepathic messages to allies.
effect: As long as the target understands one or more languages, you send a telepathic message to them that takes 10 seconds or less to speak. The target knows who the message is from and can decide to ignore it and subsequent messages.

name: Exploding Arrow
story_text: Your ammunition explodes with magical energy.

low.damage_expression: 5 + A, R, I, or P fire damage
low.all_text: 5 + A, R, I, or P fire damage

mid.damage_expression: 7 + A, R, I, or P fire damage
mid.all_text: 7 + A, R, I, or P fire damage

high.damage_expression: 10 + A, R, I, or P fire damage
high.all_text: 10 + A, R, I, or P fire damage

effect: One creature or object of your choice within 2 squares of the target takes fire damage equal to the characteristic score used for this ability’s power roll

name: Unmooring
story_text: Your weapon unleashes psionic energy that reduces your target’s weight.

low.damage_expression: 5 + M, R, I, or P damage
low.all_text: 5 + M, R, I, or P damage

mid.damage_expression: 8 + M, R, I, or P damage
mid.all_text: 8 + M, R, I, or P damage

high.damage_expression: 11 + M, R, I, or P damage
high.all_text: 11 + M, R, I, or P damage

effect: Until the end of the target’s next turn, any forced movement that affects the target has its distance increased by 2.

name: Fade
story_text: A stab, and a few quick, careful steps back.

low.all_text: 3 + M or A damage; you can shift 1 square

mid.descriptive_text: you can shift up to 2 squares
mid.all_text: 6 + M or A damage; you can shift up to 2 squares

high.descriptive_text: you can shift up to 3 squares
high.all_text: 8 + M or A damage; you can shift up to 3 squares

name: Double Strike
story_text: Why strike once when you could do it twice?
effect: If you use this ability on your turn, you can use it against one target, then use your maneuver and your move action for that turn before using the ability against a second target. You still use the same power roll for both targets.

name: Forward Thrust, Backward Smash
story_text: In your hands, the haft is as good as the head.

name: Battle Grace
story_text: You feint to move your enemies into perfect position.

mid.descriptive_text: you can swap places with the target
mid.all_text: 8 + M or A damage; you can swap places with the target

high.descriptive_text: you can swap places with the target
high.all_text: 11 + M or A damage; you can swap places with the target

effect: If you obtain a tier 2 or tier 3 outcome and can’t swap places with the target because one or both of you is too big to fit into the swapped space, you both remain in your original spaces and the target takes 1 extra damage

name: Pain for Pain
story_text: An enemy who tagged you will pay for that.
effect: If the target dealt damage to you since the end of your last turn, this strike deals additional damage equal to your Might or Agility score (your choice)

name: Devastating Rush
story_text: The faster you move, the harder you hit.
effect: You can move up to 3 squares straight toward the target before this strike, which deals extra damage equal to the number of squares you move this way

name: Lets Dance
story_text: Keeping your enemies stumbling around the battlefield is second nature to you.
effect: You can shift into any square the target leaves after you slide them

name: Shock and Awe
story_text: You execute a brutal strike that leaves your foe reeling.
effect: The target takes a bane on their next power roll made before the end of their next turn

name: Hamstring Shot
story_text: A well-placed shot leaves your enemy struggling to move.

low.all_text: 3 + M or A damage; A<w, slowed (save ends)

mid.all_text: 5 + M or A damage; A<v, slowed (save ends)

high.all_text: 7 + M or A damage; A<s, slowed (save ends)

name: Two Shot
story_text: When you fire two arrows back-to-back, both hit their mark.

name: Net and Stab
story_text: The well-thrown net that follows your main attack leaves your foes right where you want them.

low.all_text: 4 + M or A damage; A<w, slowed (EoT)

mid.all_text: 6 + M or A damage; A<v, slowed (EoT)

high.all_text: 8 + M or A damage; A<s, restrained (EoT)

name: Protective Attack
story_text: The strength of your assault makes it impossible for your foe to ignore you.
effect: The target is taunted until the end of their next turn.

name: Patient Shot
story_text: Breathe … aim … wait … then strike!
effect: If you don’t take a move action this turn, this strike deals extra damage equal to your Might or Agility score (your choice).

name: Leaping Lightning
story_text: Lightning jumps from your weapon as you strike to harm a nearby foe.

low.damage_expression: 5 + M, R, I, or P lightning damage
low.all_text: 5 + M, R, I, or P lightning damage

mid.damage_expression: 8 + M, R, I, or P lightning damage
mid.all_text: 8 + M, R, I, or P lightning damage

high.damage_expression: 11 + M, R, I, or P lightning damage
high.all_text: 11 + M, R, I, or P lightning damage

effect: A creature or object of your choice within 2 squares of the target takes lightning damage equal to the characteristic score used for this ability’s power roll

name: Where I Want You
story_text: When your stick speaks, your enemy moves.

name: Fancy Footwork
story_text: All combat is a dance—and you’ll be the one leading.
effect: You can shift into any square the target leaves after you push them

name: Shield Bash
story_text: In your hands, a shield isn’t just for protection.

high.all_text: 9 + M or A damage; push 3; M<s, prone

name: Weakening Brand
story_text: The impact of your weapon brands your target for destruction.

low.damage_expression: 3 + M, R, I, or P holy damage
low.all_text: 3 + M, R, I, or P holy damage

mid.damage_expression: 5 + M, R, I, or P holy damage
mid.all_text: 5 + M, R, I, or P holy damage

high.damage_expression: 8 + M, R, I, or P holy damage
high.all_text: 8 + M, R, I, or P holy damage

effect: Until the end of the target’s next turn, they have damage weakness equal to the characteristic score used for this ability’s power roll.

name: Extension of My Arm
story_text: When you draw your whip back after an attack, your enemy is drawn ever closer.

low.all_text: 4 + M or A damage; vertical pull 1

mid.all_text: 7 + M or A damage; vertical pull 2

high.all_text: 10 + M or A damage; vertical pull 3

name: Draconian Pride
story_text: You let loose a mighty roar to shake your foes’ spirits.

name: Dragon Breath
story_text: A furious exhalation of energy washes over your foes.
effect: You choose the ability’s damage type from acid, cold, corruption, fire, lightning, or poison.

name: The Wode Defends
story_text: Thorny vines erupt from every surface and attempt to bind your foe.

low.all_text: 2 + M or A damage; a<w, slowed (save ends)

mid.all_text: 3 + M or A damage; a<v, slowed (save ends)

high.all_text: 5 + M or A damage; a<s, slowed (save ends)

name: Shadowmeld
story_text: You become an actual shadow.
effect: You flatten yourself into a shadow against a wall or floor you are touching, and become hidden from any creature you have cover or concealment from or who isn’t observing you. While in shadow form, you have full awareness of your surroundings, and strikes made against you and tests made to search for you take a bane. You can’t move or be force moved, and you can’t take main actions or maneuvers except to exit this form or to direct creatures under your control, such as one you summon using an ability. Any ability or effect that targets more than 1 square affects you in this form only if it explicitly affects the surface you are flattened against. You can exit this form as a maneuver. If the surface you are flattened against is destroyed, this ability ends and you take 1d6 damage that can’t be reduced in any way.

name: Detonate Sigil
story_text: A magic sigil you placed on a creature explodes with energy.

low.all_text: 3 + R, I, or P damage; slide 1

mid.all_text: 5 + R, I, or P damage; slide 2

high.all_text: 7 + R, I, or P damage; slide 3

effect: The sigil disappears from the creature.

name: Concussive Slam
story_text: You slam an invisible force down upon the target.

mid.all_text: 5 + R, I, or P damage; push 1

high.all_text: 7 + R, I, or P damage; push 2; m<s, prone

name: Psionic Bolt
story_text: You shoot forth a purple beam of psychic force that moves your target.

low.damage_expression: 2 + R, I, or P psychic damage
low.all_text: 2 + R, I, or P psychic damage; slide 1

mid.damage_expression: 5 + R, I, or P psychic damage
mid.all_text: 5 + R, I, or P psychic damage; slide 2

high.damage_expression: 7 + R, I, or P psychic damage
high.all_text: 7 + R, I, or P psychic damage; slide 3

name: Minor Acceleration
story_text: You fill yourself or an ally with a burst of speed.
targets: Self or one ally; One creature or object
effect: The target gains a bonus to speed equal to your Reason, Intuition, or Presence score (your choice) until the start of your next turn.

name: Corrupt Spirit
story_text: You unlock the sinister secrets of pain.
effect: Until the end of your turn, whenever you use a damage-dealing heroic ability against a single target, you can weaken that target’s life force. The ability deals extra corruption damage equal to your highest characteristic score.

name: Share Head
story_text: You don’t have a head, but you can psionically borrow another.
effect: You can see, hear, and smell as if you were in the target’s space. Additionally, you can borrow their mouth to speak when you wish to do so, speaking in your own voice. This effect ends when you use Share Head on a different target, when the target moves more than 10 squares away from you, or when the target is no longer willing to share their head with you.

name: Stone Eyes
story_text: Your looks don’t kill—they petrify.
effect: This ability has no effect on a creature who can’t see you or who purposefully avoids looking at your eyes. A creature reduced to 0 Stamina by this ability is turned to inanimate stone.

name: Contact Spirits
story_text: The restless dead speak to you.

low.all_text: You take corruption damage equal to 5 + your level.

mid.all_text: The spirit of anyone you know of who has died speaks to you, provided they are on the same world as you. You learn how they died and can ask them one question, which they can answer truthfully or untruthfully.

high.all_text: As tier 2, but you can ask three questions.

effect: If any sapient creatures have died nearby within the last 24 hours, you have a double bane on the power roll for this ability if any of those creatures were hostile to you, or a double edge if any of them were friendly to you. When you use this ability, you can’t do so again until you earn 1 or more Victories.

name: Psychic Blast (Special Heroic Resource Cost)
story_text: Psionic energy bursts from your body in an iridescent shimmer.

low.all_text: 1 psychic damage for each Heroic Resource you spend, to a maximum equal to your level

mid.all_text: 1 psychic damage for each Heroic Resource you spend, to a maximum equal to your level + your highest characteristic

high.all_text: 1 psychic damage for each Heroic Resource you spend

effect: Whenever you become bleeding, frightened, or weakened, you must use Psychic Blast as a free triggered action.

name: Telekinetic Grasp
story_text: You reach out with your mind to move a creature or object.
effect: Drawback: You have psychic weakness 5

name: Issue Order
story_text: “Move or die, folks.”
effect: The target can use a triggered action to take a main action, a maneuver, or a move action. If you have the Strike Now tactician ability, the target can use a free triggered action instead of a triggered action to gain the benefit of this ability.

name: Posthumous Retirement
story_text: You make your modified collar explode.
effect: Your loyalty collar detonates, dealing fire damage equal to 5 plus your level to each target. Once you use this ability, you can’t use it again until you spend 1 uninterrupted minute out of combat resetting the collar.

name: Rogue Wave
story_text: You summon a wave of water to batter your foe.
effect: You can forgo dealing damage with this ability.
